name: Clean Mind
description:
Clean Mind is a puzzle game about being a better person to get a better world.

Eliminate the toxic thoughts in your brain and keep only the things that will make you and the others happy.

The red pieces only move in vertical axis, the green pieces only move in horizontal axis and the yellow ones can move in any direction. Solve the puzzles and clean your mind from toxic stuff!

Controls

WASD - Move the pieces

ESC - Pause

Space - Restart the level

Credits

-Game made by Fran Ponce.
